name: Me, Buck and Tina
description:
It was hard and i didn't got the time to add sounds and polish because i learned the tool Adventure Game Studio during this Ludum Dare to make this game.

But the challenge was awesome ! Thanks for the event !

And it's a point click game, my first released ^^ in 48 h !

Hope you'll enjoy ^^.

To play, juste take your mouse and use click to use & wheel
to select ability.

You can find my other games on http://visumeca.com
